synopsis.text:
Can you imagine a world where the majority of humanity vanishes overnight, leaving only a handful of survivors? In this anime, five individuals, including a high school student named Saneatsu, are mysteriously brought together by an enigmatic figure known as the 'Emperor.' The survivors are forced to participate in a chilling game of life and death, where the stakes are high, and the rules are simple yet brutal: the majority dies.

Every night, the remaining population is halved, as the game mercilessly eliminates the majority group. Amidst the chaos, a boy and a girl form an alliance, determined to challenge the sinister force controlling their fate. As betrayal and despair lurk around every corner, can Saneatsu and his fellow participants outsmart the game and survive the nightmarish ordeal? Join them in this thrilling, suspenseful anime that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
